definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">Player joins the world</field><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§cWARNING!!</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6EN: §eAny distribution of this mod is not allowed, if you would like to reply to a distribution source for it, send a DM to cristianmakes on Discord, please.</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">-----------------------------------------------------</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§cAVISO!!</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6PT: §eQualquer distribuição deste mod não é permitida, se você quiser ajudar reportando uma fonte de distribuição, envie uma DM para cristianmakes no Discord, por favor.</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
